attributes.action: Lift Chris Brown's 7 year old ban from the UK
attributes.additional_details: Chris Brown has millions of fans here in the UK and it would be great if this unnecessary lengthy ban could be lifted and he can be treated like a normal human.
attributes.background: Chris Brown was barred from entering the U.K. following his incident with Rihanna. I and all the Chris Brown fans acknowledge that Chris Brown's actions were not acceptable nor can be excused. However that shouldn't restrict him from performing and visiting the U.K. as he does not pose threat.
